items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Allow users to share their workout activities and progress with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can post completed workout details to a social feed.
Friends can view shared activities in their feed.
Privacy settings allow users to control who can see their posts.
non_functional: Feed updates should appear within 2 seconds of posting.
Privacy settings must comply with data protection regulations.

items.title: Friends and Following System
items.description: Enable users to connect with friends and follow other users to see their activities.
acceptance_criteria: User can search for other users by name or email.
User can send and accept friend requests.
User can follow/unfollow other users without mutual consent.
non_functional: Search results should return within 1 second.
System should handle up to 10,000 friend connections per user.

notes: Assumed that core fitness tracking functionality exists and the focus is on adding social features.
